name: 学院英雄梦 HeroDreamOfSchool
description: Return to the school world, explore different experiences, and get back to the campus time! What are you waiting for? Here you can find what you want and do what you want!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: Intel I3及以上 AMD R2500及以上 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 高于GT9600 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 867 MB available space Sound Card: 兼容所有声卡 Additional Notes:
